text:
e="preserve">Božidar Smiljanić (20 September 1936 – 7 April 2018) was a Croatian actor. He appeared in more than 70 movies from his career's beginning in 1953 until his retirement in 2016. He was born in Zagreb, Croatia.
Smiljanić was known for his movies "Journalist" (1979), "Transylvania 6-5000" (1985), "Armour of God" (1986), "Project A Part II" (1987), ' (1991), "First Class Thieves" (2005), "Ultimate Force" (2005) and "The Constitution" (2016).
Smiljanić died on 7 April 2018 in Zagreb at the age of 81.
